title: Just hit 999 wins, any Rioters down for a match?
body: I don't know if this is still a thing, but I'd love to get in-contact with someone and get a match going. Hope to hear from someone soon~{{champion:119}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=G9yu00Ad,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-21T04:58:29.178+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> When are you free? :D

Here's hoping he didn't go ahead and did that 1k without yuh.  It'd be saddening. 
{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

I haven't heard of a red doing a match with someone since S2 or S3. Might be a couple years late, I know I didn't get anyone for my 1K. Then again I wasn't exactly sure when it was since the 3 or 4 different things all say different win amounts xD

We still do! :D 

(It's just a matter of us having a bit of free time, or seeing one of these posts!)

Reds are pretty open to playing with people as far as I can tell. I've duo'd with the bronze legend riot MacGruber a few times. Just ask em every once in a while. One will likely be down to play with you.

> [{quoted}](name=xxramdom,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=G9yu00Ad,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-20T23:40:49.052+0000)
>
> I haven't heard of a red doing a match with someone since S2 or S3. Might be a couple years late, I know I didn't get anyone for my 1K. Then again I wasn't exactly sure when it was since the 3 or 4 different things all say different win amounts xD

Lol got'cha thanks for the heads up. Oh well, worth a shot!~
